languages.text: "Гладиаторские бои на разоренном мире-тюрьме — смело, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}, смело. Я бы и сам слетал на Веабос-6 сделать пару ставок и повеселиться как следует... может быть, позже".
"Gladiatorial fights on a pillaged penal world — a bold move, new blood, a very bold move. I am tempted to pay a visit to Vheabos VI myself to place a few bets and enjoy myself... Perhaps later."
languages.original_text: "Гладиаторские бои на разоренном мире-тюрьме — смело, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}, смело. Я бы и сам слетал на Веабос-6 сделать пару ставок и повеселиться как следует... может быть, позже".

traits.locale_text: "Gladiatorial fights on a pillaged penal world — a bold play, new blood, quite so. I am tempted to pay a visit to Vheabos VI myself, place a few bets, enjoy myself... Perhaps later."
"Gladiatorial fights on a pillaged penal world — a bold play, new blood, quite so. I am tempted to pay a visit to Vheabos VI myself, place a few bets, enjoy myself... Perhaps later."

"Gladiatorial fights on a pillaged penal world — a bold move, new blood, a very bold move. I am tempted to pay a visit to Vheabos VI myself to place a few bets and enjoy myself... Perhaps later."

languages.text: « Des combats de gladiateurs sur un monde pénal pillé... Voilà qui est audacieux, novice, très audacieux. D'ailleurs, j'irais bien faire un tour sur Vhéabos-VI histoire de placer quelques paris et de me payer un peu de bon temps... Plus tard, peut-être. »
languages.original_text: "Gladiatorial fights on a pillaged penal world — a bold move, new blood, a very bold move. I am tempted to pay a visit to Vheabos VI myself to place a few bets and enjoy myself... Perhaps later."

traits.locale_text: « Des combats de gladiateurs sur un monde pénal pillé... Voilà qui est audacieux, novice, très audacieux. D'ailleurs, j'irais bien faire un tour sur Vhéabos-VI histoire de placer quelques paris et de me payer un peu de bon temps... Plus tard, peut-être. »

languages.text: «Combates de gladiadores en un mundo penal saqueado: una decisión atrevida, novat{mf|o|a}, muy atrevida. Me tienta visitar Vheabos VI en persona para hacer unas apuestas y disfrutar... En otro momento, quizá».
languages.original_text: "Gladiatorial fights on a pillaged penal world — a bold move, new blood, a very bold move. I am tempted to pay a visit to Vheabos VI myself to place a few bets and enjoy myself... Perhaps later."

traits.locale_text: «Combates de gladiadores en un mundo penal saqueado: una decisión atrevida, novat{mf|o|a}, muy atrevida. Me tienta visitar Vheabos VI en persona para hacer unas apuestas y disfrutar... En otro momento, quizá».

languages.text: 「略奪された流刑惑星での肉弾戦…大胆な行動だな、新たな血よ。実に大胆だ。私もヴィアボス・VIを訪れて、賭けを楽しみたいものだが…後にしておこう」
languages.original_text: "Gladiatorial fights on a pillaged penal world — a bold move, new blood, a very bold move. I am tempted to pay a visit to Vheabos VI myself to place a few bets and enjoy myself... Perhaps later."

traits.locale_text: 「略奪された流刑惑星での肉弾戦…大胆な行動だな、新たな血よ。実に大胆だ。私もヴィアボス・VIを訪れて、賭けを楽しみたいものだが…後にしておこう」

languages.text: “在刑罚世界进行决斗，这可真是大胆的举动，新来的，相当大胆。我也很想亲自参观一下维博斯六号星，下点赌注，好好享受享受……或许以后可以试试。”
languages.original_text: "Gladiatorial fights on a pillaged penal world — a bold move, new blood, a very bold move. I am tempted to pay a visit to Vheabos VI myself to place a few bets and enjoy myself... Perhaps later."

traits.locale_text: “在刑罚世界进行决斗，这可真是大胆的举动，新来的，相当大胆。我也很想亲自参观一下维博斯六号星，下点赌注，好好享受享受……或许以后可以试试。”

languages.text: "Gladiatorenkämpfe auf einer geplünderten Strafwelt ... ein mutiger Schritt, Neuling, sehr mutig sogar. Ich bin versucht, Vheabos-VI selbst einen Besuch abzustatten, um die ein oder andere Wette zu platzieren und mich zu amüsieren ... Vielleicht später."
languages.original_text: "Gladiatorial fights on a pillaged penal world — a bold move, new blood, a very bold move. I am tempted to pay a visit to Vheabos VI myself to place a few bets and enjoy myself... Perhaps later."

traits.locale_text: "Gladiatorenkämpfe auf einer geplünderten Strafwelt ... ein mutiger Schritt, Neuling, sehr mutig sogar. Ich bin versucht, Vheabos-VI selbst einen Besuch abzustatten, um die ein oder andere Wette zu platzieren und mich zu amüsieren ... Vielleicht später."

languages.text: "Yağmalanmış bir ceza dünyasında gladyatör savaşları... Cesurca bir hamle taze kan, çok cesurca bir hamle. Vheabos VI'ya gidip birkaç bahis oynamayı ve ortamın tadını çıkarmayı ben de istiyorum. Daha sonra belki."
languages.original_text: "Gladiatorial fights on a pillaged penal world — a bold move, new blood, a very bold move. I am tempted to pay a visit to Vheabos VI myself to place a few bets and enjoy myself... Perhaps later."
